title: Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosts -  USC/UCLA move
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Doug Gottlieb & Jason Smith Guest Hosts -  USC/UCLA move
description:
With Doug and Jason filling in for Dan, the guys talk about how much of a titanic land-shift the USC/UCLA move to the Big Ten is.  Former NBA Player and college head coach Rex Walters joins Doug and Jason to talk about the Kevin Durant drama in Brooklyn, the major moves in the NBA thus far, and the other major headlines playing out in the NBA right now. Plus, Jason and Doug react to the news that the Pelicans are giving Zion Williamson a max deal.  

#jss #douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
